results.title: Wentworth Correctional Centre ID Pass for Jake Stewart
results.brief_description: Wentworth’s impact on the local industry is just as important as its global popularity, providing countless opportunities for women on both sides of the camera. It also explores complex female-focused themes including institutionalised power, female transgression and violence, motherhood and LGBTQIA+ sexuality.
results.title_for_label: Wentworth Correctional Centre ID Pass for Jake Stewart
results.description: Prop staff pass for Jake Stewart from the set of Wentworth TV series.
description_for_label: Prop staff pass for Jake Stewart from the set of Wentworth TV series.

results.title: Hoarse
results.brief_description:
Clever use of claymation brings to life this amazingly frenetic and captivating tale of one bro’s horse-riding adventures as he regales with enthusiasm about his “bestest” horse and his “bestest” accident.
Contains frequent use of coarse language.

results.title: Ode to a shoebox
results.creator_credit: Narada Lawson and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: The outside walls of the housing commission flats were as grey as a winter’s day and as cold as charity. But inside was a warm world of fun, love an adventure. This is an account of living in public housing in Melbourne.
results.description: The outside walls of the housing commission flats were as grey as a winter’s day and as cold as charity. But inside was a warm world of fun, love an adventure. This is an account of living in public housing in Melbourne.

group_siblings.title: What ever became of Charlie?

results.title: End of the Line
results.brief_description: A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival. Fleeing from town, a small child finds himself hiding in a seemingly deserted railway station. One day he is crossing the tracks when a train come hurtling towards him. A beautifully photographed film, imbued with feelings of isolation and loneliness.

results.title: The Real Story of Captain Cook's Death
results.brief_description:
Captain Cook encounters new territory and claims it. He is attacked by a native of the island and so flees. The native gets subsequently eaten by a big fish.

An animated short entered to “Create a Stamp Story” section of ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.

results.title: The Mysteries of Ludwig Leicheart
results.brief_description:
This short film depicts the historical journey across the Top End made by Ludwig Leicheart and his horse Rusty. They eat and sleep and upon waking, Leicheart gets attacked and killed by a dingo. Leicheart’s trusty horse avenges his master’s death by killing the dingo.

An animated short entered to “Create a Stamp Story” section of ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.
